result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ashley N Green

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Ashley N Green in court.  Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court for Ashley N Green.  Prosecuting attorney Navjot Singh Hira in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a final pretrial. Case remains in trial posture. Court is down on the scheduled Jury trial date. Court vacated the jury trial and rescheduled the matter. Parties are advised that effective 10/31/2022, pursuant to Chief Judge Directive 22-17, this case will be reassigned to Branch 37, Judge Dee in Room 515 of the Courthouse.
Final pre-trial scheduled for December 6, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Jury trial scheduled for January 9, 2023 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Ashley N Green in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  Thomas Hasle appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case in court for deferred prosecution hearing.  Defense requested a final pretrial and for jury trial in Branch 13 granted by the court.  Final pre-trial scheduled for October 11, 2022 at 09:00 am.  Jury trial scheduled for November 2, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Ashley N Green in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  Thomas Hasle appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Ashley N Green appeared by video means with Attorney. Attorney Fuentes notified the Court that the defenant completed the TAD evaluation and requests time to receive and review DPA.   Court ordered case adjourned for DPA hearing in Branch 37.   All parties are advised effective August 1, 2022 this case will be assigned to a Branch of RESERVE JUDGES.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for August 12, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Ashley N Green in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  Thomas Hasle appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
HEARING HELD VIA ZOOM/ LIVE STREAMING THROUGH DACAST.  Pretrial conference held.  Atty. Fuentes has received discovery but no offer and would like a status date. State advises the Court this case could resolve with a DPA and requests Defendant has a TAD evaluation. 
Case adjourned back to Br. 37.  Status conference scheduled for June 8, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.
No driving without a valid license.

Defendant Ashley N Green in court.  Julie D Knyszek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Defendant IS Public Defender eligible. Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  
The case is adjourned to Br. 37 for a Pretrial Conference.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 9, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Ashley N Green
Current: 2973 N 29th St, Milwaukee, WI 53210 United States  (Effective: 03-07-2022)
Prior: 2813 North 36Th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53210
Initial appearance on March 30, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Court was not in session on 2/22/2022, due to the weather courts were closed. Court date for 2/22/2022 has been vacated. Case adjourned to 3/30/2022, at 2:00 p.m. in OCCR. Notice has been mailed.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 2/22/22 @ 2p
